trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Executor and ActionDispatch::Reloader are Rack middlewares that wrap requests with a supplied Executor or Reloader, respectively. They are automatically included in the default application stack. The Reloader will ensure any arriving HTTP request is served with a freshly-loaded copy of the application if any code changes have occurred.

ActionDispatch::Executor and ActionDispatch::Reloader are Rack middlewares that wraps the request with a supplied Executor or Reloader, respectively. They are automatically included in the default application stack. The Reloader will ensure any arriving HTTP request is served with a freshly-loaded copy of the application if any code changes have occurred.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Executor 和 ActionDispatch::Reloader 是Rack中间件，分别用提供的Executor或Reloader包装请求。它们自动包含在默认应用程序堆栈中。如果发生任何代码更改，Reloader将确保使用新加载的应用程序副本为所有到达的HTTP请求提供服务。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Flash sets up the flash keys. Only available if config.action_controller.session_store is set to a value.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Flash 设置 flash 键。仅在 config.action_controller.session_store 设置为值时可用。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::HostAuthorization prevents against DNS rebinding and other Host header attacks. It is included in the development environment by default with the following configuration:
ActionDispatch::MiddlewareStack is Rails' equivalent of Rack::Builder, but is built for better flexibility and more features to meet Rails' requirements.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::MiddlewareStack 与Rails的 Rack::Builder 等效，但其构建目的是为了提供更好的灵活性和更多功能，以满足Rails的要求。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::RemoteIp checks for IP spoofing attacks and gets valid client_ip from request headers. Configurable with the config.action_dispatch.ip_spoofing_check, and config.action_dispatch.trusted_proxies options.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::RemoteIp 检查IP欺骗攻击并从请求标头中获取有效的 client_ip 。可以使用 config.action_dispatch.ip_spoofing_check 和 config.action_dispatch.trusted_proxies 选项进行配置。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Request#params will take parameters from the client in the JSON format and make them available in your controller inside params.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Request#params 将以JSON格式从客户端获取参数，并使它们在 params 中的控制器中可用。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Request will see the Content-Type and your parameters will be:
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Request 将看到 Content-Type ,而您的参数将是：

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::RequestId makes a unique X-Request-Id header available to the response and enables the ActionDispatch::Request#uuid method.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::RequestId 使响应可以使用唯一的X-Request-Id标头，并启用 ActionDispatch::Request#uuid 方法。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::RequestId makes a unique X-Request-Id header available to the response and enables the ActionDispatch::Request#uuid method. Configurable with config.action_dispatch.request_id_header.
ActionDispatch::Response#content_type now returned Content-Type header as it is.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Response#content_type 现在按原样返回Content-Type标头。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Response#content_type now returns the Content-Type header without modification
ActionDispatch::SSL forces every request to be served using HTTPS. Enabled if config.force_ssl is set to true. Options passed to this can be configured by setting config.ssl_options.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::SSL 强制使用HTTPS满足每个请求。如果 config.force_ssl 设置为 true ,则启用。可以通过设置 config.ssl_options 来配置传递给它的选项。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Session::ActiveRecordStore - Stores the data in a database using Active Record (requires the activerecord-session_store gem).
ActionDispatch::Session::ActiveRecordStore - Stores the data in a database using Active Record. (require activerecord-session_store gem).
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Session::ActiveRecordStore 使用Active Record将数据存储在数据库中。（需要 activerecord-session_store gem）。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Session::CacheStore - Stores the data in the Rails cache.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Session::CacheStore 将数据存储在Rails缓存中。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore - Stores everything on the client.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore 所有内容存储在客户端上。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore is responsible for storing the session in cookies. An alternate middleware can be used for this by changing the config.action_controller.session_store to an alternate value. Additionally, options passed to this can be configured by using config.action_controller.session_options.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore 负责将会话存储在cookie中。可以通过将 config.action_controller.session_store 更改为备用值来使用备用中间件。另外，可以使用 config.action_controller.session_options 配置传递给它的选项。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Session::MemCacheStore - Stores the data in a memcached cluster (this is a legacy implementation; consider using CacheStore instead).
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Session::MemCacheStore 将数据存储在内存缓存的群集中（这是旧版实现；请考虑使用CacheStore）。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::ShowExceptions rescues any exception returned by the application and renders nice exception pages if the request is local or if config.consider_all_requests_local is set to true. If config.action_dispatch.show_exceptions is set to false, exceptions will be raised regardless.
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::ShowExceptions 如果请求是本地请求，或者 config.consider_all_requests_local 设置为 true ,则ActionDispatch :: ShowExceptions会挽救应用程序返回的所有异常并呈现漂亮的异常页面。如果 config.action_dispatch.show_exceptions 设置为 false ，则无论如何都会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: ActionDispatch::Static is used to serve static assets. Disabled if config.public_file_server.enabled is false. Set config.public_file_server.index_name if you need to serve a static directory index file that is not named index. For example, to serve main.html instead of index.html for directory requests, set config.public_file_server.index_name to "main".
trans-unit.target: ActionDispatch::Static 用于提供静态资产。如果 config.public_file_server.enabled 为 false ,则禁用。如果需要为未命名为 index 的静态目录索引文件提供服务，则设置 config.public_file_server.index_name 。例如，要为目录请求提供 main.html 而不是 index.html ，请将 config.public_file_server.index_name 设置为 "main" 。

trans-unit.source: ActionView::Helpers::RecordTagHelper moved to external gem (record_tag_helper)
trans-unit.target: ActionView::Helpers::RecordTagHelper 移至外部gem（record_tag_helper）

trans-unit.source: ActionView::Layouts: Support for layouts when rendering.
trans-unit.target: ActionView::Layouts ：渲染时支持布局。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Callbacks gives Active Record style callbacks. This provides an ability to define callbacks which run at appropriate times. After defining callbacks, you can wrap them with before, after, and around custom methods.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Callbacks 提供Active Record样式的回调。这提供了定义在适当时间运行的回调的功能。定义回调之后，可以在自定义方法之前，之后和周围包装它们。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Errors#full_messages prepends the attribute name to the error message using a separator that will be looked up from errors.format (and which defaults to "%{attribute} %{message}").
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Errors#full_messages 使用分隔符将属性名称附加到错误消息，该分隔符将从errors.format中查找（默认为 "%{attribute} %{message}" ）。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Errors#generate_message (which is used by Active Model validations but may also be used manually) uses model_name.human and human_attribute_name (see above). It also translates the error message and supports translations for inherited class names as explained above in "Error message scopes".
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Errors#generate_message （其用于由活动模型验证，但也可以手动地使用）使用 model_name.human 和 human_attribute_name （见上文）。它还可以转换错误消息，并支持对继承的类名的转换，如上面“错误消息作用域”中所述。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Lint::Tests allows you to test whether an object is compliant with the Active Model API.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Lint::Tests 允许您测试对象是否符合Active Model API。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Model adds the ability for a class to work with Action Pack and Action View right out of the box.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Model 为类提供了立即使用Action Pack和Action View的功能。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Naming adds a number of class methods which make naming and routing easier to manage. The module defines the model_name class method which will define a number of accessors using some ActiveSupport::Inflector methods.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Naming 添加了许多类方法，这些方法使命名和路由更易于管理。该模块定义了 model_name 类方法，该方法将使用一些 ActiveSupport::Inflector 方法定义许多访问器。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::SecurePassword depends on bcrypt, so include this gem in your Gemfile to use ActiveModel::SecurePassword correctly. In order to make this work, the model must have an accessor named XXX_digest. Where XXX is the attribute name of your desired password. The following validations are added automatically:
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::SecurePassword 取决于 bcrypt ，因此在您的 Gemfile 中包含此gem 才能正确使用 ActiveModel::SecurePassword 。为了使此工作有效，模型必须具有一个名为 XXX_digest 的访问器。其中 XXX 是所需密码的属性名称。自动添加以下验证：

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::SecurePassword provides a way to securely store any password in an encrypted form. When you include this module, a has_secure_password class method is provided which defines a password accessor with certain validations on it by default.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::SecurePassword 提供了一种以加密形式安全存储任何密码的方法。当包含此模块时，将提供 has_secure_password 类方法，该方法定义默认情况下对其进行某些验证的 password 访问器。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Serialization provides basic serialization for your object. You need to declare an attributes Hash which contains the attributes you want to serialize. Attributes must be strings, not symbols.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Serialization 为您的对象提供基本的序列化。您需要声明一个属性哈希，其中包含要序列化的属性。属性必须是字符串，而不是符号。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Serializers::Xml has been extracted from Rails to the activemodel-serializers-xml gem. To continue using XML serialization in your application, add gem 'activemodel-serializers-xml' to your Gemfile.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Serializers::Xml 已从Rails提取到 activemodel-serializers-xml gem。要继续在应用程序中使用XML序列化，请将 gem 'activemodel-serializers-xml' 到 Gemfile 中。

trans-unit.source: ActiveModel::Translation provides integration between your object and the Rails internationalization (i18n) framework.
trans-unit.target: ActiveModel::Translation 提供了对象与Rails国际化（i18n）框架之间的集成。

trans-unit.source: ActiveRecord::Base.connected_to maintains the ability to switch connections globally.
ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::Mysql2Adapter.emulate_booleans controls whether Active Record will consider all tinyint(1) columns as booleans. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::Mysql2Adapter.emulate_booleans 控制Active Record是否将所有 tinyint(1) 列都视为布尔值。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::PostgreSQLAdapter.create_unlogged_tables controls whether database tables created should be "unlogged," which can speed up performance but adds a risk of data loss if the database crashes. It is highly recommended that you do not enable this in a production environment. Defaults to false in all environments.
trans-unit.target: ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::PostgreSQLAdapter.create_unlogged_tables 控制是否应“取消日志记录”创建的数据库表，这可以提高性能，但如果数据库崩溃，则会增加数据丢失的风险。强烈建议您不要在生产环境中启用此功能。在所有环境中默认为 false 。

ActiveRecord::Migration::CommandRecorder records commands done during a migration and knows how to reverse those commands. The CommandRecorder knows how to invert the following commands:

trans-unit.source: ActiveRecord::Observer and ActionController::Caching::Sweeper have been extracted to the rails-observers gem. You will need to add the rails-observers gem if you require these features.
trans-unit.target: ActiveRecord::Observer 和 ActionController::Caching::Sweeper 已提取到 rails-observers gem。如果需要这些功能，则需要添加 rails-observers gem。

trans-unit.source: ActiveRecord::SchemaDumper.fk_ignore_pattern allows setting a different regular expression that will be used to decide whether a foreign key's name should be dumped to db/schema.rb or not. By default, foreign key names starting with fk_rails_ are not exported to the database schema dump. Defaults to /^fk_rails_[0-9a-f]{10}$/.
trans-unit.target: ActiveRecord::SchemaDumper.fk_ignore_pattern 允许设置其他正则表达式，该正则表达式将用于确定是否应将外键的名称转储到db / schema.rb。默认情况下，以 fk_rails_ 开头的外键名称不会导出到数据库模式转储。默认为 /^fk_rails_[0-9a-f]{10}$/ 。

trans-unit.source: ActiveRecord::SchemaDumper.ignore_tables accepts an array of tables that should not be included in any generated schema file.
trans-unit.target: ActiveRecord::SchemaDumper.ignore_tables 接受应表的阵列不被包括在任何生成的模式文件。

trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport.to_time_preserves_timezone ： true

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport.utc_to_local_returns_utc_offset_times configures ActiveSupport::TimeZone.utc_to_local to return a time with a UTC offset instead of a UTC time incorporating that offset.
ActiveSupport.utc_to_local_returns_utc_offset_times: false
ActiveSupport.utc_to_local_returns_utc_offset_times: true
ActiveSupport::Cache::Store.logger specifies the logger to use within cache store operations.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Cache::Store.logger 指定要在缓存存储操作中使用的记录器。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::Cache::Strategy::LocalCache serves as a basic memory backed cache. This cache is not thread safe and is intended only for serving as a temporary memory cache for a single thread.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Cache::Strategy::LocalCache 用作基本的内存支持缓存。此缓存不是线程安全的，仅用于充当单个线程的临时内存缓存。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::Callbacks#halted_callback_hook now receive a second argument
ActiveSupport::Deprecation.behavior alternative setter to config.active_support.deprecation which configures the behavior of deprecation warnings for Rails.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Deprecation.behavior 替代二传手到 config.active_support.deprecation 其构成废弃警告的Rails的行为。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::Deprecation.disallowed_behavior alternative setter to config.active_support.disallowed_deprecation which configures the behavior of disallowed deprecation warnings for Rails.

ActiveSupport::Deprecation.disallowed_warnings alternative setter to config.active_support.disallowed_deprecation_warnings which configures deprecation warnings that the Application considers disallowed. This allows, for example, specific deprecations to be treated as hard failures.
ActiveSupport::Deprecation.silence takes a block in which all deprecation warnings are silenced.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Deprecation.silence 带一个块，其中所有弃用警告均被静默。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::Deprecation.silenced sets whether or not to display deprecation warnings. The default is false.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Deprecation.silenced 设置是否显示弃用警告。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::LogSubscriber is an object set to consume ActiveSupport::Notifications with the sole purpose of logging them. The log subscriber dispatches notifications to a registered object based on its given namespace.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::LogSubscriber 是一个设置为使用 ActiveSupport::Notifications 的对象，其唯一目的是记录它们。日志订阅者根据其给定的名称空间向已注册的对象调度通知。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::Logger.silencer is set to false to disable the ability to silence logging in a block. The default is true.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Logger.silencer 设置为 false 可禁用使块中的日志静音的功能。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::Notifications provides an instrumentation API for Ruby.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::Notifications 提供了针对Ruby的检测API。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::OrderedHash is namespaced to prevent conflicts with other implementations.
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::OrderedHash 被命名为名称空间，以防止与其他实现冲突。

trans-unit.source: ActiveSupport::TestCase Default Test Order is Now Random
trans-unit.target: ActiveSupport::TestCase 默认测试顺序现在是随机的

trans-unit.source: ApplicationController inherits from ActionController::Base, which defines a number of helpful methods. This guide will cover some of these, but if you're curious to see what's in there, you can see all of them in the API documentation or in the source itself.

ApplicationController inherits from ActionController::Base, which defines a number of helpful methods. This guide will cover some of these, but if you're curious to see what's in there, you can see all of them in the API documentation or in the source itself.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationController 继承自 ActionController::Base ，它定义了许多有用的方法。本指南将涵盖其中的一些内容，但是如果您想了解其中的内容，可以在API文档或源代码本身中查看所有内容。

trans-unit.source: ApplicationRecord inherits from ActiveRecord::Base, which defines a number of helpful methods. You can use the ActiveRecord::Base.table_name= method to specify the table name that should be used:
trans-unit.target: ApplicationRecord 继承自 ActiveRecord::Base ，它定义了许多有用的方法。您可以使用 ActiveRecord::Base.table_name= 方法指定应使用的表名：

trans-unit.source: ApplicationRecord is a new superclass for all app models, analogous to app controllers subclassing ApplicationController instead of ActionController::Base. This gives apps a single spot to configure app-wide model behavior.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationRecord 是所有应用程序模型的新超类，类似于将 ApplicationController 而不是 ActionController::Base 子类化的应用程序控制器。这使应用程序可以单点配置应用程序范围内的模型行为。

trans-unit.source: Array#to_sentence uses format settings as given in the support.array scope.
trans-unit.target: Array#to_sentence 使用support.array范围中给出的格式设置。

trans-unit.target: Array -提供的帮助程序列表的模块标准化列表。

trans-unit.target: ArticlesController#index 将使用 main 布局

trans-unit.source: AzureStorage, to manage attachments through Microsoft Azure Storage.
trans-unit.target: AzureStorage ，用于通过Microsoft Azure存储管理附件。

trans-unit.source: Billing::Invoice is composed of two constants: Billing is relative and is resolved using the algorithm of the previous section.
trans-unit.target: Billing::Invoice 由两个常量组成： Billing 是相对的，使用上一节的算法解析。

trans-unit.source: Channel instances are long-lived. A channel object will be instantiated when the cable consumer becomes a subscriber, and then lives until the consumer disconnects. This may be seconds, minutes, hours, or even days. That means you have to take special care not to do anything silly in a channel that would balloon its memory footprint or whatever. The references are forever, so they won't be released as is normally the case with a controller instance that gets thrown away after every request.
Content-Disposition (except for Azure Storage)
DateTime is not aware of DST rules and so some of these methods have edge cases when a DST change is going on. For example seconds_since_midnight might not return the real amount in such a day.
DateTime is not aware of DST rules and so some of these methods have edge cases when a DST change is going on. For example seconds_since_midnight might not return the real amount in such a day.
trans-unit.target: DateTime 不了解DST规则，因此在进行DST更改时，其中某些方法会出现极端情况。例如， seconds_since_midnight 可能不会在这一天返回实际金额。

trans-unit.source: DateTime objects have their time set to 0:00 unless same_time is true.
trans-unit.target: DateTime 除非 same_time 为true，否则DateTime对象的时间设置为0:00 。

trans-unit.source: DateTime objects will have a time set to 0:00.
trans-unit.target: DateTime 对象的时间将设置为0:00。

trans-unit.source: DateTime objects will have a time set to 23:59:59.
trans-unit.target: DateTime 对象的时间将设置为23:59:59。

I18n.locale can leak into subsequent requests served by the same thread/process if it is not consistently set in every controller. For example executing I18n.locale = :es in one POST requests will have effects for all later requests to controllers that don't set the locale, but only in that particular thread/process. For that reason, instead of I18n.locale = you can use I18n.with_locale which does not have this leak issue.
trans-unit.target: I18n.locale 如果未在每个控制器中始终设置I18n.locale，则它可能泄漏到同一线程/进程服务的后续请求中。例如，在一个POST请求中执行 I18n.locale = :es 将对以后对未设置语言环境的控制器的所有请求产生影响，而仅在该特定线程/进程中有效。因此，您可以使用 I18n.with_locale 而不是 I18n.locale = ，而不会出现此泄漏问题。

trans-unit.target: active_storage_attachments 是一个多态联接表，用于存储模型的类名。如果模型的类名更改，则需要在此表上运行迁移，以将基础 record_type 更新为模型的新类名。

trans-unit.source: active_support.deprecation_behavior: Sets up deprecation reporting for environments, defaulting to :log for development, :notify for production, and :stderr for test. If a value isn't set for config.active_support.deprecation then this initializer will prompt the user to configure this line in the current environment's config/environments file. Can be set to an array of values.
trans-unit.target: active_support.deprecation_behavior ：为环境设置弃用报告，默认为 :log 用于开发， :notify 用于生产，以及 :stderr 用于测试。如果未为 config.active_support.deprecation 设置值，则此初始化程序将提示用户在当前环境的 config/environments 文件中配置此行。可以设置为值数组。

trans-unit.source: active_support.deprecation_behavior: Sets up deprecation reporting for environments, defaulting to :log for development, :notify for production, and :stderr for test. If a value isn't set for config.active_support.deprecation then this initializer will prompt the user to configure this line in the current environment's config/environments file. Can be set to an array of values. This initializer also sets up behaviors for disallowed deprecations, defaulting to :raise for development and test and :log for production. Disallowed deprecation warnings default to an empty array.
active_support.initialize_beginning_of_week: Sets the default beginning of week for the application based on config.beginning_of_week setting, which defaults to :monday.
trans-unit.target: active_support.initialize_beginning_of_week ：根据 config.beginning_of_week 设置（默认为 :monday )为应用程序设置默认的一周开始时间。

trans-unit.source: active_support.initialize_time_zone: Sets the default time zone for the application based on the config.time_zone setting, which defaults to "UTC".
trans-unit.target: active_support.initialize_time_zone ：基于 config.time_zone 设置为应用程序设置默认时区，默认为“ UTC”。

trans-unit.source: active_support.set_configs: Sets up Active Support by using the settings in config.active_support by send'ing the method names as setters to ActiveSupport and passing the values through.
trans-unit.target: active_support.set_configs ：设置在使用设置活动的支持 config.active_support 通过 send “荷兰国际集团的方法名作为setters来 ActiveSupport 并通过传递值。

trans-unit.source: add_builtin_route: If the application is running under the development environment then this will append the route for rails/info/properties to the application routes. This route provides the detailed information such as Rails and Ruby version for public/index.html in a default Rails application.
trans-unit.target: add_builtin_route ：如果应用程序在开发环境下运行，则它将 rails/info/properties 的路由附加到应用程序路由。此路由在默认的Rails应用程序中提供了详细信息，例如 public/index.html 的 Rails和Ruby版本。

trans-unit.source: add_column(table_name, column_name, type, options): Adds a new column to the table called table_name named column_name specified to be one of the following types: :string, :text, :integer, :float, :decimal, :datetime, :timestamp, :time, :date, :binary, :boolean. A default value can be specified by passing an options hash like { default: 11 }. Other options include :limit and :null (e.g. { limit: 50, null: false }) – see ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::TableDefinition#column for details.
trans-unit.target: add_column(table_name, column_name, type, options) ：增加一个新的列称为表 table_name 命名 column_name 指定为以下类型之一： :string ， :text ， :integer ， :float ， :decimal ， :datetime ， :timestamp ， :time ， :date ， :binary ， :boolean 。可以通过传递诸如 { default: 11 } 类的 options 哈希来指定默认值。其他选项包括 :limit 和 :null （例如 { limit: 50, null: false } ）– 有关详细信息，请参见ActiveRecord :: ConnectionAdapters :: TableDefinition＃column。

trans-unit.source: add_column(table_name, column_name, type, options): Adds a new column to the table called table_name named column_name specified to be one of the following types: :string, :text, :integer, :float, :decimal, :datetime, :timestamp, :time, :date, :binary, :boolean. A default value can be specified by passing an options hash like { default: 11 }. Other options include :limit and :null (e.g. { limit: 50, null: false }) – see ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::TableDefinition#column for details.
add_foreign_key(from_table, to_table, options): Adds a new foreign key. from_table is the table with the key column, to_table contains the referenced primary key.
trans-unit.target: add_foreign_key(from_table, to_table, options) ：添加一个新的外键。 from_table 是带有键列的表， to_table 包含引用的主键。

trans-unit.source: add_generator_templates: Finds templates for generators at lib/templates for the application, railties, and engines and adds these to the config.generators.templates setting, which will make the templates available for all generators to reference.
trans-unit.target: add_generator_templates ：在 lib/templates 应用程序，Railties和引擎的模板中查找生成器的模板，并将它们添加到 config.generators.templates 设置中，这将使模板可供所有生成器参考。

trans-unit.source: add_index(table_name, column_names, options): Adds a new index with the name of the column. Other options include :name, :unique (e.g. { name: 'users_name_index', unique: true }) and :order (e.g. { order: { name: :desc } }).
trans-unit.target: add_index(table_name, column_names, options) ：添加带有列名的新索引。其他选项包括 :name ， :unique （例如 { name: 'users_name_index', unique: true } ）和 :order （例如 { order: { name: :desc } } ）。

trans-unit.source: add_locales: Adds the files in config/locales (from the application, railties, and engines) to I18n.load_path, making available the translations in these files.
trans-unit.target: add_locales ：将 config/locales 中的文件（来自应用程序，发行栏和引擎）添加到 I18n.load_path ，以使这些文件中的翻译可用。

trans-unit.source: add_reference(:table_name, :reference_name): Adds a new column reference_name_id by default an integer. See ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::SchemaStatements#add_reference for details.

trans-unit.source: add_routing_paths: Loads (by default) all config/routes.rb files (in the application and railties, including engines) and sets up the routes for the application.
trans-unit.target: add_routing_paths ：加载（默认情况下）所有 config/routes.rb 文件（在应用程序和Railtie中，包括引擎），并设置应用程序的路由。

trans-unit.source: add_to_prepare_blocks: The block for every config.to_prepare call in the application, a railtie, or engine is added to the to_prepare callbacks for Action Dispatch which will be run per request in development, or before the first request in production.
trans-unit.target: add_to_prepare_blocks ：将应用程序中的每个 config.to_prepare 调用，节流器或引擎的块添加到Action Dispatch 的 to_prepare 回调中，该回调将针对开发中的每个请求或生产中的第一个请求运行。

trans-unit.target: add_view_paths ：将目录， app/views 程序，视图，引擎和引擎中的app / views添加到应用程序视图文件的查找路径。

trans-unit.source: belongs_to Association Reference
trans-unit.target: belongs_to 协会参考

trans-unit.source: belongs_to associations must use the singular term. If you used the pluralized form in the above example for the author association in the Book model and tried to create the instance by Book.create(authors: @author), you would be told that there was an "uninitialized constant Book::Authors". This is because Rails automatically infers the class name from the association name. If the association name is wrongly pluralized, then the inferred class will be wrongly pluralized too.
trans-unit.target: belongs_to 关联必须使用单数形式。如果您在上述示例中对 Book 模型中的 author 关联使用了复数形式，并尝试通过 Book.create(authors: @author) 创建实例，则会被告知存在一个“未初始化的常量Book :: Authors ”。这是因为Rails会根据关联名称自动推断出类名称。如果关联名称被错误地复数，则推断的类也将被错误地复数。

trans-unit.source: belongs_to does not ensure reference consistency, so depending on the use case, you might also need to add a database-level foreign key constraint on the reference column, like this:
belongs_to will now trigger a validation error by default if the association is not present.
trans-unit.target: belongs_to 现在，如果不存在关联，默认情况下，belongs_to现在将触发验证错误。

trans-unit.source: bin/rails about gives information about version numbers for Ruby, RubyGems, Rails, the Rails subcomponents, your application's folder, the current Rails environment name, your app's database adapter, and schema version. It is useful when you need to ask for help, check if a security patch might affect you, or when you need some stats for an existing Rails installation.

bin/rails dbconsole figures out which database you're using and drops you into whichever command line interface you would use with it (and figures out the command line parameters to give to it, too!). It supports MySQL (including MariaDB), PostgreSQL, and SQLite3.
bin/rails initializers prints out all defined initializers in the order they are invoked by Rails.
bin/rails middleware lists Rack middleware stack enabled for your app.
bin/rails notes searches through your code for comments beginning with a specific keyword. You can refer to bin/rails notes --help for information about usage.

bin/rails routes will list all of your defined routes, which is useful for tracking down routing problems in your app, or giving you a good overview of the URLs in an app you're trying to get familiar with.
bin/rails secret will give you a pseudo-random key to use for your session secret.
bin/rails server does the basic job of creating a Rack::Server object and starting the web server.
bin/rails stats is great for looking at statistics on your code, displaying things like KLOCs (thousands of lines of code) and your code to test ratio.
bin/rails time:zones:all lists all the timezones Rails knows about.
bin/rails tmp:cache:clear clears tmp/cache.
bin/rails tmp:clear clears all cache, sockets, and screenshot files.
bin/rails tmp:create creates tmp directories for cache, sockets, and pids.
bin/rails tmp:screenshots:clear clears tmp/screenshots.
bin/rails tmp:sockets:clear clears tmp/sockets.

trans-unit.source: change_column_default(table_name, column_name, default_or_changes): Sets a default value for column_name defined by default_or_changes on table_name. Passing a hash containing :from and :to as default_or_changes will make this change reversible in the migration.
trans-unit.target: change_column_default(table_name, column_name, default_or_changes) ：设置由 table_name 上的 default_or_changes 定义的 column_name 的默认值。传递包含 :from 和 :to 的哈希作为 default_or_changes 将使此更改在迁移中是可逆的。

trans-unit.source: change_column_null(table_name, column_name, null, default = nil): Sets or removes a +NOT NULL+ constraint on column_name. The null flag indicates whether the value can be NULL. See ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::SchemaStatements#change_column_null for details.

trans-unit.source: change_column_null(table_name, column_name, null, default = nil): Sets or removes a +NOT NULL+ constraint on column_name. The null flag indicates whether the value can be NULL. See ActiveRecord::ConnectionAdapters::SchemaStatements#change_column_null for details.

config.action_cable.mount_path accepts a string for where to mount Action Cable, as part of the main server process. Defaults to /cable. You can set this as nil to not mount Action Cable as part of your normal Rails server.
trans-unit.target: config.action_cable.mount_path 作为主服务器进程的一部分，config.action_cable.mount_path接受一个字符串，用于将Action Cable挂载在哪里。默认为 /cable 。您可以将此设置为nil，以不将动作电缆作为普通的Rails服务器的一部分安装。

trans-unit.source: config.action_cable.url accepts a string for the URL for where you are hosting your Action Cable server. You would use this option if you are running Action Cable servers that are separated from your main application.
trans-unit.target: config.action_cable.url 接受URL的字符串，用于托管Action Cable服务器。如果您正在运行与主应用程序分离的Action Cable服务器，则可以使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: config.action_controller.action_on_unpermitted_parameters enables logging or raising an exception if parameters that are not explicitly permitted are found. Set to :log or :raise to enable. The default value is :log in development and test environments, and false in all other environments.
trans-unit.target: config.action_controller.action_on_unpermitted_parameters 如果找到了未明确允许的参数，则config.action_controller.action_on_unpermitted_pa​​rameters启用日志记录或引发异常。设置为 :log 或 :raise 启用。在开发和测试环境中，默认值为 :log ，在所有其他环境中为 false 。

trans-unit.target: config.action_controller.allow_forgery_protection 启用或禁用CSRF保护。默认情况下，在测试模式下为 false ，在所有其他模式下为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_controller.include_all_helpers configures whether all view helpers are available everywhere or are scoped to the corresponding controller. If set to false, UsersHelper methods are only available for views rendered as part of UsersController. If true, UsersHelper methods are available everywhere. The default configuration behavior (when this option is not explicitly set to true or false) is that all view helpers are available to each controller.
trans-unit.target: config.action_controller.include_all_helpers 配置所有视图助手在任何地方都可用，还是作用域为相应的控制器。如果设置为 false ，则 UsersHelper 方法仅适用于作为 UsersController 一部分呈现的视图。如果为 true ，则到处都可以使用 UsersHelper 方法。默认配置行为（当此选项未显式设置为 true 或 false 时）是所有视图助手对每个控制器都可用。

trans-unit.target: config.action_controller.logger 接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器，然后将其用于记录来自Action Controller的信息。设置为 nil 禁用日志记录。

trans-unit.target: config.action_controller.permit_all_parameters 设置默认情况下允许进行质量分配的所有参数。默认值为 false 。

config.action_controller includes a number of configuration settings:

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.cookies_same_site_protection configures the default value of the SameSite attribute when setting cookies. When set to nil, the SameSite attribute is not added. To allow the value of the SameSite attribute to be configured dynamically based on the request, a proc may be specified. For example:
config.action_dispatch.cookies_same_site_protection: :lax
config.action_dispatch.cookies_same_site_protection: nil
config.action_dispatch.default_charset specifies the default character set for all renders. Defaults to nil.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.default_charset 指定所有渲染的默认字符集。默认为 nil 。

trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.default_headers 是具有HTTP头的哈希，默认情况下在每个响应中设置HTTP头。默认情况下，它定义为：

trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.encrypted_cookie_cipher 设置用于加密cookie的密码。默认为 "aes-256-gcm" 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.encrypted_cookie_salt sets the encrypted cookies salt value. Defaults to 'encrypted cookie'.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.encrypted_cookie_salt 设置加密的cookie盐值。默认为 'encrypted cookie' 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.encrypted_signed_cookie_salt sets the signed encrypted cookies salt value. Defaults to 'signed encrypted cookie'.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.encrypted_signed_cookie_salt 设置签名的加密cookie的盐值。默认为 'signed encrypted cookie' 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.http_auth_salt sets the HTTP Auth salt value. Defaults to 'http authentication'.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.http_auth_salt 设置HTTP Auth盐值。默认为 'http authentication' 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.ignore_accept_header is used to determine whether to ignore accept headers from a request. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.ignore_accept_header 用于确定是否忽略请求中的接受标头。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.perform_deep_munge configures whether deep_munge method should be performed on the parameters. See Security Guide for more information. It defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.perform_deep_munge 配置是否 deep_munge 参数执行deep_munge方法。有关更多信息，请参见安全指南。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.rescue_responses configures what exceptions are assigned to an HTTP status. It accepts a hash and you can specify pairs of exception/status. By default, this is defined as:
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.rescue_responses 配置将哪些异常分配给HTTP状态。它接受哈希，您可以指定成对的异常/状态。默认情况下，它定义为：

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.return_only_media_type_on_content_type change the return value of ActionDispatch::Response#content_type to the Content-Type header without modification. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.return_only_media_type_on_content_type 将 ActionDispatch::Response#content_type 的返回值更改为Content-Type标头，而无需进行修改。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.return_only_media_type_on_content_type ： false

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.session_store sets the name of the store for session data. The default is :cookie_store; other valid options include :active_record_store, :mem_cache_store or the name of your own custom class.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.session_store 设置会话数据存储的名称。默认值为 :cookie_store ; 其他有效选项包括 :active_record_store ， :mem_cache_store 或您自己的自定义类的名称。

trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.ssl_default_redirect_status = 308

config.action_dispatch.ssl_default_redirect_status configures the default HTTP status code used when redirecting non-GET/HEAD requests from HTTP to HTTPS in the ActionDispatch::SSL middleware. Defaults to 308 as defined in https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7538.

trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.use_authenticated_cookie_encryption 控制签名和加密的cookie是使用AES-256-GCM密码还是使用较旧的AES-256-CBC密码。默认为 true 。
