trans-unit.source: config.action_dispatch.x_sendfile_header specifies server specific X-Sendfile header. This is useful for accelerated file sending from server. For example it can be set to 'X-Sendfile' for Apache.
trans-unit.target: config.action_dispatch.x_sendfile_header 指定服务器特定的X-Sendfile标头。这对于加速从服务器发送文件很有用。例如，对于Apache，可以将其设置为“ X-Sendfile”。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailbox.incinerate_after accepts an ActiveSupport::Duration indicating how long after processing ActionMailbox::InboundEmail records should be destroyed. It defaults to 30.days.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailbox.incinerate_after 接受 ActiveSupport::Duration 指示处理 ActionMailbox::InboundEmail 记录后应销毁多长时间。默认为 30.days 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailbox.logger contains the logger used by Action Mailbox. It accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class. The default is Rails.logger.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailbox.logger 包含操作邮箱使用的记录器。它接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器。默认值为 Rails.logger 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailbox.queues.incineration accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for incineration jobs. It defaults to :action_mailbox_incineration.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailbox.queues.incineration 接受一个符号，该符号指示要用于焚化作业的活动作业队列。默认为 :action_mailbox_incineration 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailbox.queues.incineration accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for incineration jobs. When this option is nil, incineration jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name).
config.action_mailbox.queues.incineration: :action_mailbox_incineration
config.action_mailbox.queues.incineration: nil
config.action_mailbox.queues.routing accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for routing jobs. It defaults to :action_mailbox_routing.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailbox.queues.routing 接受一个符号，该符号指示要用于路由作业的活动作业队列。默认为 :action_mailbox_routing 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailbox.queues.routing accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for routing jobs. When this option is nil, routing jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name).
config.action_mailbox.queues.routing: :action_mailbox_routing
config.action_mailbox.queues.routing: nil
config.action_mailbox provides the following configuration options:
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailbox 提供以下配置选项：

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.asset_host sets the host for the assets. Useful when CDNs are used for hosting assets rather than the application server itself. You should only use this if you have a different configuration for Action Controller, otherwise use config.asset_host.
config.action_mailer.default_options configures Action Mailer defaults. Use to set options like from or reply_to for every mailer. These default to:
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.default_options 配置操作邮件程序的默认值。用于为每个邮件设置选项，例如 from 或 reply_to 。这些默认值为：

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.deliver_later_queue_name specifies the Active Job queue to use for delivery jobs. When this option is set to nil, delivery jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name). Make sure that your Active Job adapter is also configured to process the specified queue, otherwise delivery jobs may be silently ignored.
config.action_mailer.deliver_later_queue_name specifies the queue name for mailers. By default this is mailers.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.deliver_later_queue_name 指定邮件程序的队列名称。默认情况下，这是 mailers 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.deliver_later_queue_name: :mailers
config.action_mailer.deliver_later_queue_name: nil
config.action_mailer.delivery_job specifies delivery job for mail.
config.action_mailer.delivery_job specifies delivery job for mail. Defaults to ActionMailer::DeliveryJob.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.delivery_job 指定邮件的传递作业。默认为 ActionMailer::DeliveryJob 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.delivery_job: "ActionMailer::MailDeliveryJob"
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.delivery_job ： "ActionMailer::MailDeliveryJob"

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.delivery_job: ActionMailer::DeliveryJob
config.action_mailer.delivery_method defines the delivery method and defaults to :smtp. See the configuration section in the Action Mailer guide for more info.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.delivery_method 定义传递方法，默认为 :smtp 。有关更多信息，请参见《Action Mailer指南》中的“配置”部分。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.interceptors registers interceptors which will be called before mail is sent.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.interceptors 注册将在发送邮件之前调用的拦截器。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.logger accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class, which is then used to log information from Action Mailer. Set to nil to disable logging.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.logger 接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器，然后将其用于记录来自Action Mailer的信息。设置为 nil 禁用日志记录。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.observers registers observers which will be notified when mail is delivered.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.observers 注册观察者，该观察者将在传递邮件时得到通知。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.perform_caching specifies whether the mailer templates should perform fragment caching or not. If it's not specified, the default will be true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.perform_caching 指定邮件程序模板是否应该执行片段缓存。如果未指定，则默认 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.perform_deliveries specifies whether mail will actually be delivered and is true by default. It can be convenient to set it to false for testing.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.perform_deliveries 指定是否实际发送邮件，并且默认情况下为true。将其设置为 false 进行测试可能很方便。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.preview_interceptors registers interceptors which will be called before mail is previewed.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.preview_interceptors 注册将在预览邮件之前调用的拦截器。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.preview_path specifies the location of mailer previews.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.preview_path 指定邮件预览的位置。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.raise_delivery_errors specifies whether to raise an error if email delivery cannot be completed. It defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.raise_delivery_errors 指定如果无法完成电子邮件传递，是否引发错误。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.sendmail_settings allows detailed configuration for the sendmail delivery method. It accepts a hash of options, which can include any of these options:
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.sendmail_settings 允许对 sendmail 传递方法进行详细配置。它接受选项的哈希，其中可以包括以下任何一个选项：

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.show_previews enable or disable mailer previews. By default this is true in development.
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.show_previews 启用或禁用邮件预览。默认情况下，这在开发中是 true 的。

trans-unit.source: config.action_mailer.smtp_settings allows detailed configuration for the :smtp delivery method. It accepts a hash of options, which can include any of these options:
trans-unit.target: config.action_mailer.smtp_settings 允许对 :smtp 传递方法进行详细配置。它接受选项的哈希，其中可以包括以下任何一个选项：

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.annotate_rendered_view_with_filenames determines whether to annotate rendered view with template file names. This defaults to false.
config.action_view.automatically_disable_submit_tag determines whether submit_tag should automatically disable on click, this defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.automatically_disable_submit_tag 确定是否应在单击时自动禁用 submit_tag ，默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.cache_template_loading controls whether or not templates should be reloaded on each request. Defaults to whatever is set for config.cache_classes.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.cache_template_loading 控制是否应在每个请求上重新加载模板。默认为 config.cache_classes 设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.debug_missing_translation determines whether to wrap the missing translations key in a <span> tag or not. This defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.debug_missing_translation 确定是否将缺少的翻译键包装在 <span> 标记中。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.default_enforce_utf8 determines whether forms are generated with a hidden tag that forces older versions of Internet Explorer to submit forms encoded in UTF-8. This defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.default_enforce_utf8 确定是否使用隐藏标签生成表单，该标签强制旧版本的Internet Explorer提交以UTF-8编码的表单。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.default_enforce_utf8: false
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.default_enforce_utf8 ： false

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.default_form_builder tells Rails which form builder to use by default. The default is ActionView::Helpers::FormBuilder. If you want your form builder class to be loaded after initialization (so it's reloaded on each request in development), you can pass it as a String.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.default_form_builder 告诉Rails默认使用哪个表单构建器。默认值为 ActionView::Helpers::FormBuilder 。如果您希望在初始化后加载表单构建器类（以便在开发中的每个请求上都重新加载它），则可以将其作为 String 传递。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.embed_authenticity_token_in_remote_forms allows you to set the default behavior for authenticity_token in forms with remote: true. By default it's set to false, which means that remote forms will not include authenticity_token, which is helpful when you're fragment-caching the form. Remote forms get the authenticity from the meta tag, so embedding is unnecessary unless you support browsers without JavaScript. In such case you can either pass authenticity_token: true as a form option or set this config setting to true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.embed_authenticity_token_in_remote_forms 允许您设置带有 remote: true 表单中的 authenticity_token 的默认行为。默认情况下，它设置为 false ，这意味着远程表单将不包含 authenticity_token ，这在片段缓存表单时很有用。远程表单从 meta 标记获取真实性，因此除非您支持不带JavaScript的浏览器，否则不需要嵌入。在这种情况下，您可以将 authenticity_token: true 作为表单选项传递，或将此配置设置设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.erb_trim_mode gives the trim mode to be used by ERB. It defaults to '-', which turns on trimming of tail spaces and newline when using <%= -%> or <%= =%>. See the Erubis documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.erb_trim_mode 给出ERB要使用的修整模式。它默认为 '-' ，当使用 <%= -%> 或 <%= =%> 时，将启用对尾部空格和换行符的修剪。有关更多信息，请参见Erubis文档。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.field_error_proc provides an HTML generator for displaying errors that come from Active Model. The default is
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.field_error_proc 提供了一个HTML生成器，用于显示来自Active Model的错误。默认是

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.form_with_generates_ids determines whether form_with generates ids on inputs.
config.action_view.form_with_generates_ids determines whether form_with generates ids on inputs. This defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.form_with_generates_ids 确定 form_with 是否在输入上生成ID。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.form_with_generates_ids: false
config.action_view.form_with_generates_ids: true
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.form_with_generates_ids ： true

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.form_with_generates_remote_forms determines whether form_with generates remote forms or not.
config.action_view.form_with_generates_remote_forms determines whether form_with generates remote forms or not. This defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.form_with_generates_remote_forms 确定 form_with 是否生成远程表单。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.form_with_generates_remote_forms: false
config.action_view.form_with_generates_remote_forms: true
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.form_with_generates_remote_forms ： true

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.logger accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class, which is then used to log information from Action View. Set to nil to disable logging.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.logger 接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器，然后将其用于记录来自Action View的信息。设置为 nil 禁用日志记录。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.prefix_partial_path_with_controller_namespace determines whether or not partials are looked up from a subdirectory in templates rendered from namespaced controllers. For example, consider a controller named Admin::ArticlesController which renders this template:
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.prefix_partial_path_with_controller_namespace 确定是否从命名空间控制器渲染的模板中的子目录中查找部分。例如，考虑一个名为 Admin::ArticlesController 的控制器，该控制器呈现此模板：

trans-unit.source: config.action_view.preload_links_header determines whether javascript_include_tag and stylesheet_link_tag will generate a Link header that preload assets. This defaults to true.
config.action_view.raise_on_missing_translations determines whether an error should be raised for missing translations. This defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.action_view.raise_on_missing_translations 确定是否应针对缺少的翻译引发错误。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.action_view includes a small number of configuration settings:
trans-unit.target: config.action_view 包含少量配置设置：

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.custom_serializers allows to set custom argument serializers. Defaults to [].
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.custom_serializers 允许设置自定义参数序列化器。默认为 [] 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.default_queue_name can be used to change the default queue name. By default this is "default".
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.default_queue_name 可用于更改默认队列名称。默认情况下，这是 "default" 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.log_arguments controls if the arguments of a job are logged. Defaults to true.

config.active_job.logger accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class, which is then used to log information from Active Job. You can retrieve this logger by calling logger on either an Active Job class or an Active Job instance. Set to nil to disable logging.
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.logger 接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器，然后将其用于记录来自Active Job的信息。您可以通过在Active Job类或Active Job实例上调用 logger 来检索此logger 。设置为 nil 禁用日志记录。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.queue_adapter sets the adapter for the queuing backend. The default adapter is :async. For an up-to-date list of built-in adapters see the ActiveJob::QueueAdapters API documentation.
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.queue_adapter 设置队列后端的适配器。默认的适配器是 :async 。有关内置适配器的最新列表，请参见ActiveJob :: QueueAdapters API文档。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.queue_name_delimiter has a default value of '_'. If queue_name_prefix is set, then queue_name_delimiter joins the prefix and the non-prefixed queue name.
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.queue_name_delimiter 的默认值为 '_' 。如果设置了 queue_name_prefix ，则 queue_name_delimiter 将前缀和非前缀队列名连接在一起。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.queue_name_prefix allows you to set an optional, non-blank, queue name prefix for all jobs. By default it is blank and not used.
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.queue_name_prefix 允许您为所有作业设置一个可选的，非空白的队列名称前缀。默认情况下为空白，不使用。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.retry_jitter controls the amount of "jitter" (random variation) applied to the delay time calculated when retrying failed jobs.
config.active_job.retry_jitter: 0.0
config.active_job.retry_jitter: 0.15
config.active_job.return_false_on_aborted_enqueue change the return value of #enqueue to false instead of the job instance when the enqueuing is aborted. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.return_false_on_aborted_enqueue 将中止排队时将 #enqueue 的返回值更改为false，而不是作业实例。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.return_false_on_aborted_enqueue: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_job.return_false_on_aborted_enqueue ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_job.skip_after_callbacks_if_terminated controls whether after_enqueue / after_perform callbacks run when a before_enqueue / before_perform callback halts with throw :abort.
config.active_job.skip_after_callbacks_if_terminated: false
config.active_job.skip_after_callbacks_if_terminated: true
config.active_job provides the following configuration options:
trans-unit.target: config.active_job 提供以下配置选项：

trans-unit.source: config.active_model.i18n_customize_full_message is a boolean value which controls whether the full_message error format can be overridden at the attribute or model level in the locale files. This is false by default.
trans-unit.target: config.active_model.i18n_customize_full_message 是一个布尔值，它控制是否可以在区域设置文件的属性或模型级别覆盖 full_message 错误格式。默认情况下为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.action_on_strict_loading_violation enables raising or logging an exception if strict_loading is set on an association. The default value is :raise in all environments. It can be changed to :log to send violations to the logger instead of raising.
config.active_record.belongs_to_required_by_default is a boolean value and controls whether a record fails validation if belongs_to association is not present.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.belongs_to_required_by_default 是一个布尔值，它控制记录是否在不存在 belongs_to 关联的情况下通过验证。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.belongs_to_required_by_default: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.belongs_to_required_by_default ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.cache_timestamp_format controls the format of the timestamp value in the cache key. Default is :usec.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.cache_timestamp_format 控制高速缓存键中时间戳值的格式。默认是 :usec 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.cache_versioning indicates whether to use a stable #cache_key method that is accompanied by a changing version in the #cache_version method.
config.active_record.cache_versioning: false
config.active_record.cache_versioning: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.cache_versioning ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.collection_cache_versioning enables the same cache key to be reused when the object being cached of type ActiveRecord::Relation changes by moving the volatile information (max updated at and count) of the relation's cache key into the cache version to support recycling cache key.

config.active_record.collection_cache_versioning enables the same cache key to be reused when the object being cached of type ActiveRecord::Relation changes by moving the volatile information (max updated at and count) of the relation's cache key into the cache version to support recycling cache key. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.collection_cache_versioning 通过将关系缓存键的易失性信息（最大更新次数和计数）移动到缓存版本中以支持回收缓存，从而使 ActiveRecord::Relation 类型的缓存对象发生更改时，可以重用同一缓存键。键。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.collection_cache_versioning: false
config.active_record.collection_cache_versioning: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.collection_cache_versioning ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.default_timezone determines whether to use Time.local (if set to :local) or Time.utc (if set to :utc) when pulling dates and times from the database. The default is :utc.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.default_timezone 确定从数据库中提取日期和时间时是使用 Time.local （如果设置为 :local ）还是 Time.utc （如果设置为 :utc ）。默认值为 :utc 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.destroy_association_async_job allows specifying the job that will be used to destroy the associated records in background. It defaults to ActiveRecord::DestroyAssociationAsyncJob.

config.active_record.dump_schema_after_migration is a flag which controls whether or not schema dump should happen (db/schema.rb or db/structure.sql) when you run migrations. This is set to false in config/environments/production.rb which is generated by Rails. The default value is true if this configuration is not set.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.dump_schema_after_migration 是一个标志，用于控制在运行迁移时是否应进行架构转储（ db/schema.rb 或 db/structure.sql ）。在Rails生成的 config/environments/production.rb 中将其设置为 false 。如果未设置此配置，则默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.dump_schemas controls which database schemas will be dumped when calling db:schema:dump. The options are :schema_search_path (the default) which dumps any schemas listed in schema_search_path, :all which always dumps all schemas regardless of the schema_search_path, or a string of comma separated schemas.

config.active_record.dump_schemas controls which database schemas will be dumped when calling db:structure:dump. The options are :schema_search_path (the default) which dumps any schemas listed in schema_search_path, :all which always dumps all schemas regardless of the schema_search_path, or a string of comma separated schemas.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.dump_schemas 控制在调用 db:structure:dump 时将转储哪些数据库模式。选项是 :schema_search_path （默认值），它会转储 schema_search_path 中列出的所有模式； :all 会始终转储所有模式，而不管 schema_search_path 或逗号分隔的模式字符串。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.error_on_ignored_order specifies if an error should be raised if the order of a query is ignored during a batch query. The options are true (raise error) or false (warn). Default is false.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.error_on_ignored_order 指定在批处理查询期间忽略查询顺序时是否应引发错误。选项为 true （引发错误）或 false （警告）。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.has_many_inversing enables setting the inverse record when traversing belongs_to to has_many associations.
config.active_record.has_many_inversing: false
config.active_record.has_many_inversing: true
config.active_record.index_nested_attribute_errors allows errors for nested has_many relationships to be displayed with an index as well as the error. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.index_nested_attribute_errors 允许嵌套 has_many 关系的错误与索引以及错误一起显示。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.internal_metadata_table_name lets you set a string to be used as the name of the internal metadata table.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.internal_metadata_table_name 允许您设置一个字符串用作内部元数据表的名称。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.legacy_connection_handling allows to enable new connection handling API. For applications using multiple databases, this new API provides support for granular connection swapping.
config.active_record.legacy_connection_handling: false
config.active_record.legacy_connection_handling: true
config.active_record.lock_optimistically controls whether Active Record will use optimistic locking and is true by default.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.lock_optimistically 控制Active Record是否使用乐观锁定，默认情况下为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.logger accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class, which is then passed on to any new database connections made. You can retrieve this logger by calling logger on either an Active Record model class or an Active Record model instance. Set to nil to disable logging.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.logger 接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器，然后将其传递到建立的任何新数据库连接。您可以通过在Active Record模型类或Active Record模型实例上调用 logger 来检索此logger 。设置为 nil 禁用日志记录。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.maintain_test_schema is a boolean value which controls whether Active Record should try to keep your test database schema up-to-date with db/schema.rb (or db/structure.sql) when you run your tests. The default is true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.maintain_test_schema 是一个布尔值，用于控制Active Record 在运行测试时是否应尝试使用 db/schema.rb （或 db/structure.sql ）来使您的测试数据库架构保持最新。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.partial_writes is a boolean value and controls whether or not partial writes are used (i.e. whether updates only set attributes that are dirty). Note that when using partial writes, you should also use optimistic locking config.active_record.lock_optimistically since concurrent updates may write attributes based on a possibly stale read state. The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.partial_writes 是一个布尔值，它控制是否使用部分写入（即，更新是否仅设置了脏的属性）。请注意，在使用部分写入时，还应使用乐观锁定 config.active_record.lock_optimistically ,因为并发更新可能会基于过时的读取状态写入属性。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.pluralize_table_names specifies whether Rails will look for singular or plural table names in the database. If set to true (the default), then the Customer class will use the customers table. If set to false, then the Customer class will use the customer table.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.pluralize_table_names 指定Rails将在数据库中查找单数还是复数表名。如果设置为 true （默认值），则Customer类将使用 customers 表。如果设置为false，则Customer类将使用 customer 表。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.primary_key_prefix_type lets you adjust the naming for primary key columns. By default, Rails assumes that primary key columns are named id (and this configuration option doesn't need to be set). There are two other choices:

config.active_record.primary_key_prefix_type lets you adjust the naming for primary key columns. By default, Rails assumes that primary key columns are named id (and this configuration option doesn't need to be set.) There are two other choices:
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.primary_key_prefix_type 可让您调整主键列的命名。默认情况下，Rails假设主键列的名称为 id （并且不需要设置此配置选项。）还有两个选择：

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.protected_environments lets you set an array of names of environments where destructive actions should be prohibited.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.protected_environments 允许您设置应该禁止破坏性操作的环境的名称数组。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.queues.destroy allows specifying the Active Job queue to use for destroy jobs. When this option is nil, purge jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name). It defaults to nil.
config.active_record.record_timestamps is a boolean value which controls whether or not timestamping of create and update operations on a model occur. The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.record_timestamps 是一个布尔值，它控制是否在模型上进行 create 和 update 操作的时间戳记。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.schema_format controls the format for dumping the database schema to a file. The options are :ruby (the default) for a database-independent version that depends on migrations, or :sql for a set of (potentially database-dependent) SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.schema_format 控制将数据库模式转储到文件的格式。选项是 :ruby （默认）用于依赖于迁移的与数据库无关的版本，或 :sql 用于一组（可能与数据库有关的）SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.schema_migrations_table_name lets you set a string to be used as the name of the schema migrations table.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.schema_migrations_table_name 允许您设置一个字符串，用作架构迁移表的名称。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.strict_loading_by_default is a boolean value that either enables or disables strict_loading mode by default. Defaults to false.

config.active_record.table_name_prefix lets you set a global string to be prepended to table names. If you set this to northwest_, then the Customer class will look for northwest_customers as its table. The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.table_name_prefix 可让您设置要在表名之前添加的全局字符串。如果将其设置为 northwest_ ，则Customer类将查找 northwest_customers 作为其表。默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.table_name_suffix lets you set a global string to be appended to table names. If you set this to _northwest, then the Customer class will look for customers_northwest as its table. The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.table_name_suffix 可让您设置要附加到表名的全局字符串。如果将其设置为 _northwest ，则Customer类将查找 customers_northwest 作为其表。默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.timestamped_migrations controls whether migrations are numbered with serial integers or with timestamps. The default is true, to use timestamps, which are preferred if there are multiple developers working on the same application.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.timestamped_migrations 控制是使用串行整数还是使用时间戳对迁移进行编号。缺省值为 true ，以使用时间戳，如果有多个开发人员在同一个应用程序上工作，则首选时间戳。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.use_schema_cache_dump enables users to get schema cache information from db/schema_cache.yml (generated by bin/rails db:schema:cache:dump), instead of having to send a query to the database to get this information. Defaults to true.

config.active_record.use_schema_cache_dump enables users to get schema cache information from db/schema_cache.yml (generated by rails db:schema:cache:dump), instead of having to send a query to the database to get this information. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.use_schema_cache_dump 使用户可以从 db/schema_cache.yml （由 rails db:schema:cache:dump 生成）获取架构缓存信息，而不必向数据库发送查询以获取此信息。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record.warn_on_records_fetched_greater_than allows setting a warning threshold for query result size. If the number of records returned by a query exceeds the threshold, a warning is logged. This can be used to identify queries which might be causing a memory bloat.
trans-unit.target: config.active_record.warn_on_records_fetched_greater_than 允许设置查询结果大小的警告阈值。如果查询返回的记录数超过阈值，则会记录一条警告。这可用于识别可能导致内存膨胀的查询。

trans-unit.source: config.active_record includes a variety of configuration options:
trans-unit.target: config.active_record 包含各种配置选项：

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.analyzers accepts an array of classes indicating the analyzers available for Active Storage blobs. The default is [ActiveStorage::Analyzer::ImageAnalyzer, ActiveStorage::Analyzer::VideoAnalyzer]. The former can extract width and height of an image blob; the latter can extract width, height, duration, angle, and aspect ratio of a video blob.
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.analyzers 接受一组类，这些类指示可用于Active Storage Blob的分析器。默认值为 [ActiveStorage::Analyzer::ImageAnalyzer, ActiveStorage::Analyzer::VideoAnalyzer] 。前者可以提取图像斑点的宽度和高度。后者可以提取视频Blob的宽度，高度，持续时间，角度和长宽比。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.content_types_allowed_inline accepts an array of strings indicating the content types that Active Storage allows to serve as inline. The default is %w(image/png image/gif image/jpg image/jpeg image/tiff image/bmp image/vnd.adobe.photoshop image/vnd.microsoft.icon application/pdf).

config.active_storage.content_types_to_serve_as_binary accepts an array of strings indicating the content types that Active Storage will always serve as an attachment, rather than inline. The default is %w(text/html text/javascript image/svg+xml application/postscript application/x-shockwave-flash text/xml application/xml application/xhtml+xml application/mathml+xml text/cache-manifest).

config.active_storage.content_types_to_serve_as_binary accepts an array of strings indicating the content types that Active Storage will always serve as an attachment, rather than inline. The default is %w(text/html text/javascript image/svg+xml application/postscript application/x-shockwave-flash text/xml application/xml application/xhtml+xml).
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.content_types_to_serve_as_binary 接受一个字符串数组，该字符串指示Active Storage将始终充当附件而不是内联的内容类型。默认值为 %w(text/html text/javascript image/svg+xml application/postscript application/x-shockwave-flash text/xml application/xml application/xhtml+xml) 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.draw_routes can be used to toggle Active Storage route generation. The default is true.
config.active_storage.logger can be used to set the logger used by Active Storage. Accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class.
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.logger 可用于设置Active Storage使用的记录器。接受符合Log4r界面或默认Ruby Logger类的记录器。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.paths accepts a hash of options indicating the locations of previewer/analyzer commands. The default is {}, meaning the commands will be looked for in the default path. Can include any of these options:
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.paths 接受选项的哈希值，这些值指示预览器/分析器命令的位置。默认值为 {} ，这意味着将在默认路径中查找命令。可以包括以下任何选项：

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.previewers accepts an array of classes indicating the image previewers available in Active Storage blobs. The default is [ActiveStorage::Previewer::PDFPreviewer, ActiveStorage::Previewer::VideoPreviewer]. The former can generate a thumbnail from the first page of a PDF blob; the latter from the relevant frame of a video blob.
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.previewers 接受一组类，这些类指示Active Storage Blob中可用的图像预览器。默认值为 [ActiveStorage::Previewer::PDFPreviewer, ActiveStorage::Previewer::VideoPreviewer] 。前者可以从PDF Blob的第一页生成缩略图。后者来自视频Blob的相关帧。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.previewers accepts an array of classes indicating the image previewers available in Active Storage blobs. The default is [ActiveStorage::Previewer::PopplerPDFPreviewer, ActiveStorage::Previewer::MuPDFPreviewer, ActiveStorage::Previewer::VideoPreviewer]. PopplerPDFPreviewer and MuPDFPreviewer can generate a thumbnail from the first page of a PDF blob; VideoPreviewer from the relevant frame of a video blob.

config.active_storage.queues.analysis accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for analysis jobs. When this option is nil, analysis jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name).
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.queues.analysis 接受一个符号，该符号指示要用于分析作业的活动作业队列。如果此选项为 nil ，则将分析作业发送到默认的“活动作业”队列（请参阅 config.active_job.default_queue_name ）。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.queues.analysis: :active_storage_analysis
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.queues.analysis ： :active_storage_analysis

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.queues.analysis: nil

config.active_storage.queues.mirror accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for direct upload mirroring jobs. When this option is nil, mirroring jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name). The default is nil.

config.active_storage.queues.purge accepts a symbol indicating the Active Job queue to use for purge jobs. When this option is nil, purge jobs are sent to the default Active Job queue (see config.active_job.default_queue_name).
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.queues.purge 接受一个符号，该符号指示要用于清除作业的活动作业队列。当此选项为 nil 时，清除作业将发送到默认的“活动作业”队列（请参阅 config.active_job.default_queue_name ）。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.queues.purge: :active_storage_purge
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.queues.purge ： :active_storage_purge

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.queues.purge: nil

config.active_storage.replace_on_assign_to_many determines whether assigning to a collection of attachments declared with has_many_attached replaces any existing attachments or appends to them. The default is true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.replace_on_assign_to_many 确定分配给使用 has_many_attached 声明的附件的集合是替换现有的附件还是将其附加。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.replace_on_assign_to_many: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.replace_on_assign_to_many ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.resolve_model_to_route can be used to globally change how Active Storage files are delivered.
config.active_storage.routes_prefix can be used to set the route prefix for the routes served by Active Storage. Accepts a string that will be prepended to the generated routes.
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.routes_prefix 可用于为Active Storage服务的路由设置路由前缀。接受将在生成的路由之前添加的字符串。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.service_urls_expire_in determines the default expiry of URLs generated by:
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.service_urls_expire_in 确定通过以下方式生成的URL的默认到期时间：

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.track_variants determines whether variants are recorded in the database. The default is true.
config.active_storage.track_variants: true

config.active_storage.variable_content_types accepts an array of strings indicating the content types that Active Storage can transform through ImageMagick. The default is %w(image/png image/gif image/jpg image/jpeg image/pjpeg image/tiff image/bmp image/vnd.adobe.photoshop image/vnd.microsoft.icon image/webp).

config.active_storage.variable_content_types accepts an array of strings indicating the content types that Active Storage can transform through ImageMagick. The default is %w(image/png image/gif image/jpg image/jpeg image/pjpeg image/tiff image/vnd.adobe.photoshop image/vnd.microsoft.icon).
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.variable_content_types 接受一个字符串数组，该字符串指示Active Storage可以通过ImageMagick转换的内容类型。默认值为 %w(image/png image/gif image/jpg image/jpeg image/pjpeg image/tiff image/vnd.adobe.photoshop image/vnd.microsoft.icon) 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.variant_processor accepts a symbol :mini_magick or :vips, specifying whether variant transformations will be performed with MiniMagick or ruby-vips. The default is :mini_magick.
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage.variant_processor 接受符号 :mini_magick 或 :vips ，指定是否将使用MiniMagick或ruby-vips执行变体转换。默认值为 :mini_magick 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_storage.web_image_content_types accepts an array of strings regarded as web image content types in which variants can be processed without being converted to the fallback PNG format. If you want to use WebP variants in your application you can add image/webp to this array. The default is %w(image/png image/jpeg image/jpg image/gif).
config.active_storage provides the following configuration options:
trans-unit.target: config.active_storage 提供以下配置选项：

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.bare enables or disables the loading of active_support/all when booting Rails. Defaults to nil, which means active_support/all is loaded.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.bare 在启动Rails时启用或禁用 active_support/all 的加载。默认为 nil ，这表示已加载 active_support/all 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.escape_html_entities_in_json enables or disables the escaping of HTML entities in JSON serialization. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.escape_html_entities_in_json 启用或禁用JSON序列化中HTML实体的转义。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.hash_digest_class allows configuring the digest class to use to generate non-sensitive digests, such as the ETag header.
config.active_support.hash_digest_class: ::Digest::MD5
config.active_support.hash_digest_class: ::Digest::SHA1
config.active_support.test_order sets the order in which the test cases are executed. Possible values are :random and :sorted. Defaults to :random.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.test_order 设置执行测试用例的顺序。可能的值是 :random 和 :sorted 。默认为 :random 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.time_precision sets the precision of JSON encoded time values. Defaults to 3.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.time_precision 设置JSON编码时间值的精度。默认为 3 。

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.use_authenticated_message_encryption specifies whether to use AES-256-GCM authenticated encryption as the default cipher for encrypting messages instead of AES-256-CBC.

config.active_support.use_authenticated_message_encryption specifies whether to use AES-256-GCM authenticated encryption as the default cipher for encrypting messages instead of AES-256-CBC. This is false by default.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.use_authenticated_message_encryption 指定是否使用AES-256-GCM身份验证加密作为加密邮件的默认密码，而不是AES-256-CBC。默认情况下为false。

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.use_authenticated_message_encryption: false
config.active_support.use_authenticated_message_encryption: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.use_authenticated_message_encryption ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.use_sha1_digests specifies whether to use SHA-1 instead of MD5 to generate non-sensitive digests, such as the ETag header. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.use_sha1_digests 指定是否使用SHA-1而不是MD5来生成非敏感摘要，例如ETag头。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.use_sha1_digests: true
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.use_sha1_digests ： true

trans-unit.source: config.active_support.use_standard_json_time_format enables or disables serializing dates to ISO 8601 format. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.active_support.use_standard_json_time_format 启用或禁用将日期序列化为ISO 8601格式。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.add_autoload_paths_to_load_path says whether autoload paths have to be added to $LOAD_PATH. This flag is true by default, but it is recommended to be set to false in :zeitwerk mode early, in config/application.rb. Zeitwerk uses absolute paths internally, and applications running in :zeitwerk mode do not need require_dependency, so models, controllers, jobs, etc. do not need to be in $LOAD_PATH. Setting this to false saves Ruby from checking these directories when resolving require calls with relative paths, and saves Bootsnap work and RAM, since it does not need to build an index for them.
trans-unit.target: config.add_autoload_paths_to_load_path 表示是否需要将自动加载路径添加到 $LOAD_PATH 。默认情况下，此标志为 true ，但建议在 :zeitwerk 模式下的 config/application.rb 中早期将其设置为 false 。Zeitwerk在内部使用绝对路径，并且以 :zeitwerk 模式运行的应用程序不需要 require_dependency ，因此模型，控制器，作业等都不需要位于 $LOAD_PATH 。将其设置为 false 可以避免Ruby在解决 require 时检查这些目录 使用相对路径进行调用，并节省了Bootsnap工作和RAM，因为它不需要为它们建立索引。

trans-unit.source: config.after_initialize takes a block which will be run after Rails has finished initializing the application. That includes the initialization of the framework itself, engines, and all the application's initializers in config/initializers. Note that this block will be run for rake tasks. Useful for configuring values set up by other initializers:
trans-unit.target: config.after_initialize 包含一个块，该块将在 Rails完成对应用程序的初始化之后运行。这包括框架本身，引擎以及 config/initializers 中所有应用程序的初始化程序的初始化。注意，此块将为耙任务运行。对于配置其他初始化程序设置的值很有用：

trans-unit.source: config.asset_host sets the host for the assets. Useful when CDNs are used for hosting assets, or when you want to work around the concurrency constraints built-in in browsers using different domain aliases. Shorter version of config.action_controller.asset_host.
trans-unit.target: config.asset_host 设置资产的主机。当CDN用于托管资产时，或者当您要解决使用不同域别名的浏览器中内置的并发约束时，此选项很有用。较短版本的 config.action_controller.asset_host 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.compile is a boolean that can be used to turn on live Sprockets compilation in production.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.compile 是一个布尔值，可用于在生产中打开实时Sprockets编译。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.css_compressor defines the CSS compressor to use. It is set by default by sass-rails. The unique alternative value at the moment is :yui, which uses the yui-compressor gem.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.css_compressor 定义要使用的CSS压缩器。默认情况下由 sass-rails 设置。目前唯一的替代值是 :yui ，它使用 yui-compressor gem。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.debug disables the concatenation and compression of assets. Set to true by default in development.rb.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.debug 禁用资产的串联和压缩。在 development.rb 中默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.digest enables the use of SHA256 fingerprints in asset names. Set to true by default.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.digest 允许在资产名称中使用SHA256指纹。默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.enabled a flag that controls whether the asset pipeline is enabled. It is set to true by default.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.enabled 一个标志，用于控制是否启用资产管道。默认情况下将其设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.gzip a flag that enables the creation of gzipped version of compiled assets, along with non-gzipped assets. Set to true by default.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.gzip 一个标志，用于创建已压缩资产的已压缩版本以及未压缩的资产。默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.js_compressor defines the JavaScript compressor to use. Possible values are :closure, :uglifier and :yui which require the use of the closure-compiler, uglifier or yui-compressor gems respectively.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.js_compressor 定义要使用的JavaScript压缩器。可能的值是 :closure ， :uglifier 和 :yui ，它们分别需要使用 uglifier closure-compiler ，uglifier或 yui-compressor gem。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.logger accepts a logger conforming to the interface of Log4r or the default Ruby Logger class. Defaults to the same configured at config.logger. Setting config.assets.logger to false will turn off served assets logging.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.logger 接受符合Log4r接口或默认Ruby Logger 类的记录器。默认为 config.logger 中配置的相同内容。将 config.assets.logger 设置为 false 将关闭服务资产记录。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.manifest defines the full path to be used for the asset precompiler's manifest file. Defaults to a file named manifest-<random>.json in the config.assets.prefix directory within the public folder.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.manifest 定义用于资产预编译器清单文件的完整路径。默认为一个名为 manifest-<random>.json 在 config.assets.prefix 公共文件夹中的目录。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.paths contains the paths which are used to look for assets. Appending paths to this configuration option will cause those paths to be used in the search for assets.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.paths 包含用于查找资产的路径。将路径添加到此配置选项将导致这些路径用于搜索资产。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.precompile allows you to specify additional assets (other than application.css and application.js) which are to be precompiled when rake assets:precompile is run.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.precompile 允许您指定运行 rake assets:precompile 时要预编译的其他资产（ application.css 和 application.js 除外）。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.prefix defines the prefix where assets are served from. Defaults to /assets.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.prefix 定义从中提供资产的前缀。默认为 /assets 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.quiet disables logging of assets requests. Set to true by default in development.rb.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.quiet 禁用资产请求的日志记录。在 development.rb 中默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.unknown_asset_fallback allows you to modify the behavior of the asset pipeline when an asset is not in the pipeline, if you use sprockets-rails 3.2.0 or newer. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.unknown_asset_fallback 如果使用sprockets-rails 3.2.0或更高版本，则config.assets.unknown_asset_fallback允许您在资产不在管道中时修改资产管道的行为。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: config.assets.unknown_asset_fallback: false
trans-unit.target: config.assets.unknown_asset_fallback ： false

trans-unit.source: config.assets.version is an option string that is used in SHA256 hash generation. This can be changed to force all files to be recompiled.
trans-unit.target: config.assets.version 是在SHA256哈希生成中使用的选项字符串。可以更改为强制重新编译所有文件。

trans-unit.source: config.autoload_once_paths accepts an array of paths from which Rails will autoload constants that won't be wiped per request. Relevant if config.cache_classes is false, which is the case in development mode by default. Otherwise, all autoloading happens only once. All elements of this array must also be in autoload_paths. Default is an empty array.
trans-unit.target: config.autoload_once_paths 接受一系列路径，Rails将从这些路径中自动加载不会按请求擦除的常量。如果 config.cache_classes 为 false ，则相关，默认情况下在开发模式下就是这种情况。否则，所有自动加载仅发生一次。此数组的所有元素也必须位于 autoload_paths 中。默认为空数组。

trans-unit.source: config.autoload_once_paths accepts an array of paths from which Rails will autoload constants that won't be wiped per request. Relevant if config.cache_classes is false, which is the default in the development environment. Otherwise, all autoloading happens only once. All elements of this array must also be in autoload_paths. Default is an empty array.

config.autoload_paths accepts an array of paths from which Rails will autoload constants. Default is all directories under app. It is no longer recommended to adjust this. See Autoloading and Reloading Constants
trans-unit.target: config.autoload_paths 接受一系列路径，Rails将从这些路径中自动加载常量。默认为 app 下的所有目录。不再建议对此进行调整。请参见自动加载和重新加载常量

trans-unit.source: config.autoload_paths accepts an array of paths from which Rails will autoload constants. Default is an empty array. Since Rails 6, it is not recommended to adjust this. See Autoloading and Reloading Constants.
config.autoload_paths is not changeable from environment-specific configuration files.
trans-unit.target: config.autoload_paths 不能从特定于环境的配置文件中更改。

trans-unit.source: config.autoloader sets the autoloading mode. This option defaults to :zeitwerk if 6.0 is specified in config.load_defaults. Applications can still use the classic autoloader by setting this value to :classic after loading the framework defaults:
trans-unit.target: config.autoloader 设置自动加载模式。如果在 config.load_defaults 中指定了 6.0 ,则此选项默认为 :zeitwerk 。通过在加载框架默认值之后将此值设置为 :classic ，应用程序仍然可以使用经典的自动加载器：

trans-unit.source: config.autoloader sets the autoloading mode. This option defaults to :zeitwerk when config.load_defaults is called with 6.0 or greater. Applications can still use the classic autoloader by setting this value to :classic after loading the framework defaults:
config.autoloader: :zeitwerk
trans-unit.target: config.autoloader ： :zeitwerk

trans-unit.source: config.beginning_of_week sets the default beginning of week for the application. Accepts a valid day of week as a symbol (e.g. :monday).
config.beginning_of_week sets the default beginning of week for the application. Accepts a valid week day symbol (e.g. :monday).
trans-unit.target: config.beginning_of_week 设置应用程序的默认星期几。接受有效的星期几符号（例如 :monday ）。

trans-unit.source: config.cache_classes controls whether or not application classes and modules should be reloaded if they change. Defaults to false in the development environment, and true in production. In the test environment, the default is false if Spring is installed, true otherwise.
config.cache_classes controls whether or not application classes and modules should be reloaded on each request. Defaults to false in development mode, and true in test and production modes.
trans-unit.target: config.cache_classes 控制是否应在每个请求上重新加载应用程序类和模块。默认为 false 发展模式， true 在测试和生产模式。

trans-unit.source: config.cache_store configures which cache store to use for Rails caching. Options include one of the symbols :memory_store, :file_store, :mem_cache_store, :null_store, :redis_cache_store, or an object that implements the cache API. Defaults to :file_store.
trans-unit.target: config.cache_store 配置用于Rails缓存的缓存存储。选项包括以下符号之一 :memory_store ， :file_store ， :mem_cache_store ， :null_store ， :redis_cache_store 或实现高速缓存API的对象。默认为 :file_store 。

trans-unit.source: config.cache_store configures which cache store to use for Rails caching. Options include one of the symbols :memory_store, :file_store, :mem_cache_store, :null_store, :redis_cache_store, or an object that implements the cache API. Defaults to :file_store. See Cache Stores for per-store configuration options.
config.colorize_logging specifies whether or not to use ANSI color codes when logging information. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: config.colorize_logging 指定在记录信息时是否使用ANSI颜色代码。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: config.consider_all_requests_local is a flag. If true then any error will cause detailed debugging information to be dumped in the HTTP response, and the Rails::Info controller will show the application runtime context in /rails/info/properties. true by default in development and test environments, and false in production mode. For finer-grained control, set this to false and implement local_request? in controllers to specify which requests should provide debugging information on errors.
trans-unit.target: config.consider_all_requests_local 是一个标志。如果为 true ,则任何错误都将导致详细的调试信息转储到HTTP响应中，并且 Rails::Info 控制器将在 /rails/info/properties 中显示应用程序运行时上下文。 true 默认情况下，开发和测试环境，以及 false 的生产模式。对于更细粒度的控制，请将其设置为 false 并实现 local_request? 在控制器中指定哪些请求应提供有关错误的调试信息。

trans-unit.source: config.consider_all_requests_local is a flag. If true then any error will cause detailed debugging information to be dumped in the HTTP response, and the Rails::Info controller will show the application runtime context in /rails/info/properties. true by default in the development and test environments, and false in production. For finer-grained control, set this to false and implement show_detailed_exceptions? in controllers to specify which requests should provide debugging information on errors.
config.console allows you to set class that will be used as console you run bin/rails console. It's best to run it in console block:
config.console allows you to set class that will be used as console you run rails console. It's best to run it in console block:
trans-unit.target: config.console 允许您设置将用作运行 rails console 的控制台的类。最好在 console 块中运行它：

trans-unit.source: config.credentials.content_path configures lookup path for encrypted credentials.
trans-unit.target: config.credentials.content_path 配置加密凭据的查找路径。

trans-unit.source: config.credentials.key_path configures lookup path for encryption key.
trans-unit.target: config.credentials.key_path 配置加密密钥的查找路径。

trans-unit.source: config.debug_exception_response_format sets the format used in responses when errors occur in development mode. Defaults to :api for API only apps and :default for normal apps.
trans-unit.target: config.debug_exception_response_format 设置开发模式中发生错误时响应中使用的格式。对于仅API应用程序，默认为 :api ；对于普通应用程序， :default 为：default。

trans-unit.source: config.debug_exception_response_format sets the format used in responses when errors occur in the development environment. Defaults to :api for API only apps and :default for normal apps.

config.disable_sandbox controls whether or not someone can start a console in sandbox mode. This is helpful to avoid a long running session of sandbox console, that could lead a database server to run out of memory. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.disable_sandbox 控制是否有人可以在沙箱模式下启动控制台。这有助于避免沙箱控制台长时间运行，这可能导致数据库服务器内存不足。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: config.eager_load when true, eager loads all registered config.eager_load_namespaces. This includes your application, engines, Rails frameworks, and any other registered namespace.
trans-unit.target: config.eager_load 当 true ，渴望加载所有注册 config.eager_load_namespaces 。这包括您的应用程序，引擎，Rails框架和任何其他注册的名称空间。

trans-unit.source: config.eager_load_namespaces registers namespaces that are eager loaded when config.eager_load is true. All namespaces in the list must respond to the eager_load! method.
trans-unit.target: config.eager_load_namespaces 注册当 config.eager_load 为 true 时急切加载的名称空间。列表中的所有名称空间都必须响应 eager_load! 方法。

trans-unit.source: config.eager_load_paths accepts an array of paths from which Rails will eager load on boot if cache classes is enabled. Defaults to every folder in the app directory of the application.
trans-unit.target: config.eager_load_paths 接受一组路径，如果启用了缓存类，Rails将在引导时从中加载这些路径。默认为 app 目录中的每个文件夹。

trans-unit.source: config.enable_dependency_loading: when true, enables autoloading, even if the application is eager loaded and config.cache_classes is set as true. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: config.enable_dependency_loading ：如果为true，则启用自动加载，即使应用程序已急切加载并且 config.cache_classes 设置为true。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: config.encoding sets up the application-wide encoding. Defaults to UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: config.encoding 设置应用程序范围的编码。默认为UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: config.exceptions_app sets the exceptions application invoked by the ShowException middleware when an exception happens. Defaults to ActionDispatch::PublicExceptions.new(Rails.public_path).
trans-unit.target: config.exceptions_app 设置发生异常时由ShowException中间件调用的异常应用程序。默认为 ActionDispatch::PublicExceptions.new(Rails.public_path) 。

trans-unit.source: config.file_watcher is the class used to detect file updates in the file system when config.reload_classes_only_on_change is true. Rails ships with ActiveSupport::FileUpdateChecker, the default, and ActiveSupport::EventedFileUpdateChecker (this one depends on the listen gem). Custom classes must conform to the ActiveSupport::FileUpdateChecker API.
trans-unit.target: config.file_watcher 是当 config.reload_classes_only_on_change 为 true 时用于检测文件系统中文件更新的类。 Rails附带了 ActiveSupport::FileUpdateChecker （默认值）和 ActiveSupport::EventedFileUpdateChecker （这取决于侦听 gem）。自定义类必须符合 ActiveSupport::FileUpdateChecker API。

trans-unit.source: config.filter_parameters used for filtering out the parameters that you don't want shown in the logs, such as passwords or credit card numbers. It also filters out sensitive values of database columns when call #inspect on an Active Record object. By default, Rails filters out passwords by adding Rails.application.config.filter_parameters += [:password] in config/initializers/filter_parameter_logging.rb. Parameters filter works by partial matching regular expression.
trans-unit.target: config.filter_parameters 用于过滤出您不想在日志中显示的参数，例如密码或信用卡号。当在Active Record对象上调用 #inspect 时，它还会过滤掉数据库列的敏感值。默认情况下，Rails通过在 config/initializers/filter_parameter_logging.rb 中添加 Rails.application.config.filter_parameters += [:password] 过滤掉密码。参数过滤器通过部分匹配正则表达式来工作。

trans-unit.source: config.force_ssl forces all requests to be served over HTTPS by using the ActionDispatch::SSL middleware, and sets config.action_mailer.default_url_options to be { protocol: 'https' }. This can be configured by setting config.ssl_options - see the ActionDispatch::SSL documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: config.force_ssl 通过使用 ActionDispatch::SSL 中间件强制所有请求通过HTTPS进行服务，并将 config.action_mailer.default_url_options 设置为 { protocol: 'https' } 。可以通过设置 config.ssl_options 进行配置- 有关详细信息，请参见ActionDispatch :: SSL文档。

trans-unit.source: config.force_ssl forces all requests to be served over HTTPS, and sets "https://" as the default protocol when generating URLs. Enforcement of HTTPS is handled by the ActionDispatch::SSL middleware, which can be configured via config.ssl_options - see its documentation for details.
config.i18n.available_locales defines the permitted available locales for the app. Defaults to all locale keys found in locale files, usually only :en on a new application.
trans-unit.target: config.i18n.available_locales 定义应用程序允许的可用语言环境。默认为在语言环境文件中找到的所有语言环境键，通常仅在新应用程序上 :en 。

trans-unit.source: config.i18n.default_locale sets the default locale of an application used for i18n. Defaults to :en.
trans-unit.target: config.i18n.default_locale 设置用于i18n的应用程序的默认语言环境。默认为 :en 。

trans-unit.source: config.i18n.enforce_available_locales ensures that all locales passed through i18n must be declared in the available_locales list, raising an I18n::InvalidLocale exception when setting an unavailable locale. Defaults to true. It is recommended not to disable this option unless strongly required, since this works as a security measure against setting any invalid locale from user input.
trans-unit.target: config.i18n.enforce_available_locales 确保必须在 available_locales 列表中声明所有通过i18n传递的语言环境，并在设置不可用的语言环境时引发 I18n::InvalidLocale 异常。默认为 true 。建议除非强烈要求，否则不要禁用此选项，因为这是一种安全措施，可防止用户输入设置任何无效的语言环境。

trans-unit.source: config.i18n.fallbacks sets fallback behavior for missing translations. Here are 3 usage examples for this option:
trans-unit.target: config.i18n.fallbacks 设置缺少转换的回退行为。这是此选项的3个用法示例：

trans-unit.source: config.i18n.load_path sets the path Rails uses to look for locale files. Defaults to config/locales/*.{yml,rb}.
trans-unit.target: config.i18n.load_path 设置Rails用于查找语言环境文件的路径。默认为 config/locales/*.{yml,rb} 。

trans-unit.source: config.i18n.raise_on_missing_translations determines whether an error should be raised for missing translations in controllers and views. This defaults to false.

config.javascript_path sets the path where your app's JavaScript lives relative to the app directory. The default is javascript, used by webpacker. An app's configured javascript_path will be excluded from autoload_paths.
config.load_defaults sets new defaults up to and including the version passed. Such that passing, say, 6.0 also gets the new defaults from every version before it.

config.log_formatter defines the formatter of the Rails logger. This option defaults to an instance of ActiveSupport::Logger::SimpleFormatter for all environments. If you are setting a value for config.logger you must manually pass the value of your formatter to your logger before it is wrapped in an ActiveSupport::TaggedLogging instance, Rails will not do it for you.

config.log_formatter defines the formatter of the Rails logger. This option defaults to an instance of ActiveSupport::Logger::SimpleFormatter for all modes. If you are setting a value for config.logger you must manually pass the value of your formatter to your logger before it is wrapped in an ActiveSupport::TaggedLogging instance, Rails will not do it for you.
trans-unit.target: config.log_formatter 定义Rails记录器的格式化程序。对于所有模式，此选项默认为 ActiveSupport::Logger::SimpleFormatter 的实例。如果要为 config.logger 设置值，则必须先将格式程序的值传递给记录器，然后再将其包装在 ActiveSupport::TaggedLogging 实例中，Rails不会为您这样做。

trans-unit.source: config.log_level defines the verbosity of the Rails logger. This option defaults to :debug for all environments except production, where it defaults to :info. The available log levels are: :debug, :info, :warn, :error, :fatal, and :unknown.
config.log_level defines the verbosity of the Rails logger. This option defaults to :debug for all environments. The available log levels are: :debug, :info, :warn, :error, :fatal, and :unknown.
trans-unit.target: config.log_level 定义Rails记录器的详细程度。对于所有环境，此选项默认为 :debug 。可用的日志级别为：： :debug ， :info ， :warn ， :error ， :fatal 和 :unknown 。

trans-unit.source: config.log_tags accepts a list of: methods that the request object responds to, a Proc that accepts the request object, or something that responds to to_s. This makes it easy to tag log lines with debug information like subdomain and request id - both very helpful in debugging multi-user production applications.
trans-unit.target: config.log_tags 接受以下列表： request 对象响应的方法，接受 request 对象的 Proc 或响应 to_s 的对象。这使使用调试信息（如子域和请求ID）标记日志行变得容易，这对调试多用户生产应用程序都非常有用。

trans-unit.source: config.logger is the logger that will be used for Rails.logger and any related Rails logging such as ActiveRecord::Base.logger. It defaults to an instance of ActiveSupport::TaggedLogging that wraps an instance of ActiveSupport::Logger which outputs a log to the log/ directory. You can supply a custom logger, to get full compatibility you must follow these guidelines:
trans-unit.target: config.logger 是将用于 Rails.logger 和任何相关Rails日志记录（例如 ActiveRecord::Base.logger 。它默认为 ActiveSupport::TaggedLogging 的实例，该实例包装 ActiveSupport::Logger 的实例，该实例将日志输出到 log/ 目录。您可以提供自定义记录器，要获得完全兼容性，必须遵循以下准则：

trans-unit.source: config.middleware.insert_after(existing_middleware, new_middleware, args) - Adds the new middleware after the specified existing middleware in the middleware stack.
trans-unit.target: config.middleware.insert_after(existing_middleware, new_middleware, args) -在中间件堆栈中指定的现有中间件之后添加新的中间件。

trans-unit.source: config.middleware.insert_before(existing_middleware, new_middleware, args) - Adds the new middleware before the specified existing middleware in the middleware stack.
trans-unit.target: config.middleware.insert_before(existing_middleware, new_middleware, args) -在中间件堆栈中指定的现有中间件之前添加新的中间件。

trans-unit.source: config.middleware.use(new_middleware, args) - Adds the new middleware at the bottom of the middleware stack.
trans-unit.target: config.middleware.use(new_middleware, args) -在中间件堆栈的底部添加新的中间件。

trans-unit.source: config.middleware allows you to configure the application's middleware. This is covered in depth in the Configuring Middleware section below.
trans-unit.target: config.middleware 允许您配置应用程序的中间件。下面的“ 配置中间件”部分将对此进行深入介绍。

trans-unit.source: config.public_file_server.enabled configures Rails to serve static files from the public directory. This option defaults to true, but in the production environment it is set to false because the server software (e.g. NGINX or Apache) used to run the application should serve static files instead. If you are running or testing your app in production mode using WEBrick (it is not recommended to use WEBrick in production) set the option to true. Otherwise, you won't be able to use page caching and request for files that exist under the public directory.
trans-unit.target: config.public_file_server.enabled 将Rails配置为提供来自公共目录的静态文件。该选项默认为 true ，但是在生产环境中将其设置为 false ,因为用于运行该应用程序的服务器软件（例如NGINX或Apache）应该提供静态文件。如果您正在使用WEBrick在生产模式下运行或测试您的应用程序（不建议在生产环境中使用WEBrick），请将选项设置为 true 。否则，您将无法使用页面缓存并请求存在于公共目录下的文件。

trans-unit.source: config.public_file_server.enabled configures Rails to serve static files from the public directory. This option defaults to true, but in the production environment it is set to false because the server software (e.g. NGINX or Apache) used to run the application should serve static files instead. If you are running or testing your app in production using WEBrick (it is not recommended to use WEBrick in production) set the option to true. Otherwise, you won't be able to use page caching and request for files that exist under the public directory.
config.rake_eager_load when true, eager load the application when running Rake tasks. Defaults to false.

config.reload_classes_only_on_change enables or disables reloading of classes only when tracked files change. By default tracks everything on autoload paths and is set to true. If config.cache_classes is true, this option is ignored.
trans-unit.target: config.reload_classes_only_on_change 仅在跟踪的文件发生更改时才启用或禁用类的重新加载。默认情况下，会跟​​踪自动加载路径上的所有内容，并将其设置为 true 。如果 config.cache_classes 为 true ，则忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: config.session_store specifies what class to use to store the session. Possible values are :cookie_store which is the default, :mem_cache_store, and :disabled. The last one tells Rails not to deal with sessions. Defaults to a cookie store with application name as the session key. Custom session stores can also be specified:
trans-unit.target: config.session_store 指定用于存储会话的类。可能的值为默认值 :cookie_store ， :mem_cache_store 和 :disabled 。最后一个告诉Rails不要处理会话。默认为以应用程序名称为会话密钥的cookie存储。还可以指定自定义会话存储：

trans-unit.source: config.ssl_options: { hsts: { subdomains: true } }
trans-unit.target: config.ssl_options ： { hsts: { subdomains: true } }

trans-unit.source: config.time_zone sets the default time zone for the application and enables time zone awareness for Active Record.
trans-unit.target: config.time_zone 设置应用程序的默认时区，并为Active Record启用时区识别。

trans-unit.source: config.web_console.allowed_ips: Authorized list of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses and networks (defaults: 127.0.0.1/8, ::1).
config.web_console.whiny_requests: Log a message when a console rendering is prevented (defaults: true).
trans-unit.target: config.web_console.whiny_requests ：阻止控制台渲染时记录一条消息（默认值： true ）。

trans-unit.source: config.web_console.whitelisted_ips: Authorized list of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses and networks (defaults: 127.0.0.1/8, ::1).
trans-unit.target: config.web_console.whitelisted_ips ：IPv4或IPv6地址和网络的授权列表（默认值： 127.0.0.1/8, ::1 ）。

trans-unit.source: config/boot.rb contains:
trans-unit.target: config/boot.rb 包含：

trans-unit.source: config/routes.rb.
trans-unit.target: config/routes.rb.

trans-unit.source: confirm: 'question?' - If present the unobtrusive JavaScript drivers will provide a prompt with the question specified. If the user accepts, the form is processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: confirm: 'question?' -如果存在的话，流畅的JavaScript驱动程序将提示您指定问题。如果用户接受，则将正常处理表单，否则将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: confirm: 'question?' - If present, the unobtrusive JavaScript drivers will provide a prompt with the question specified. If the user accepts, the form is processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: confirm: 'question?' -如果存在的话，流畅的JavaScript驱动程序将提示您指定问题。如果用户接受，则将正常处理表单，否则将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: confirm: 'question?' - This will add a JavaScript confirm prompt with the question specified. If the user accepts, the form is processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: confirm: 'question?' -这将添加带有指定问题的JavaScript确认提示。如果用户接受，则将正常处理表单，否则将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: confirm: 'question?' - This will allow the unobtrusive JavaScript driver to prompt with the question specified (in this case, the resulting text would be question?. If the user accepts, the link is processed normally, otherwise no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: confirm: 'question?' -这将允许不引人注目的JavaScript驱动程序提示输入指定的问题（在这种情况下，结果文本将是“ question? 。如果用户接受，则链接将被正常处理，否则将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: conn: an AbstractAdapter object, which was obtained by earlier by calling checkout on this pool.

trans-unit.source: db/schema.rb cannot express everything your database may support such as triggers, sequences, stored procedures, check constraints, etc. While migrations may use execute to create database constructs that are not supported by the Ruby migration DSL, these constructs may not be able to be reconstituted by the schema dumper. If you are using features like these, you should set the schema format to :sql in order to get an accurate schema file that is useful to create new database instances.
trans-unit.target: db/schema.rb 无法表达数据库可能支持的所有内容，例如触发器，序列，存储过程，检查约束等。尽管迁移可能使用 execute 创建不受Ruby迁移DSL支持的数据库结构，但这些结构可能不被支持。能够由模式转储器重构。如果使用的是这些功能，则应将架构格式设置为 :sql ，以获取准确的架构文件，该文件对于创建新的数据库实例很有用。

trans-unit.source: errors[attribute] is used to retrieve the errors of a model for a given attribute. If errors are present, the method should return an array of strings that are the errors for the attribute in question. If localization is used, the strings should be localized for the current locale. If no error is present, the method should return an empty array.
trans-unit.target: errors[attribute] 用于检索给定属性的模型错误。如果存在错误，则该方法应返回字符串数组，这些字符串是有关属性的错误。如果使用本地化，则应针对当前语言环境对字符串进行本地化。如果没有错误，则该方法应返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: method: symbol of HTTP verb - This modifier will dynamically create an HTML form and immediately submit the form for processing using the HTTP verb specified. Useful for having links perform a POST operation in dangerous actions like deleting a record (which search bots can follow while spidering your site). Supported verbs are :post, :delete, :patch, and :put. Note that if the user has JavaScript disabled, the request will fall back to using GET. If href: '#' is used and the user has JavaScript disabled clicking the link will have no effect. If you are relying on the POST behavior, you should check for it in your controller's action by using the request object's methods for post?, delete?, patch?, or put?.
trans-unit.target: method: symbol of HTTP verb -此修饰符将动态创建HTML表单，并立即使用指定的HTTP动词提交表单以进行处理。对于使链接在诸如删除记录之类的危险动作中执行POST操作很有用（搜索机器人可能会在抓取您的网站时跟踪它们）。支持的动词是 :post ， :delete ， :patch 和 :put 。请注意，如果用户禁用了JavaScript，则该请求将退回到使用GET的状态。如果使用 href: '#' 并且用户禁用了JavaScript，则单击链接无效。如果依赖于POST行为，则应使用请求对象的 post? 方法在控制器的操作中检查它是否正确？， delete? ， patch? 或 put? 。

trans-unit.source: purpose and compatible work together; while this thread is waiting for the exclusive lock, it will yield its share (if any) to any other attempt whose purpose appears in this attempt's compatible list. This allows a “loose” upgrade, which, being less strict, prevents some classes of deadlocks.
trans-unit.target: purpose 和 compatible 互通；当该线程等待排他锁时，它将把其共享（如果有）分享给 purpose 在此尝试的 compatible 列表中出现的任何其他尝试。这样可以进行“宽松”升级，这种升级不太严格，可以防止某些类的死锁。

trans-unit.source: rails about gives information about version numbers for Ruby, RubyGems, Rails, the Rails subcomponents, your application's folder, the current Rails environment name, your app's database adapter, and schema version. trans-unit.source: rails dbconsole figures out which database you're using and drops you into whichever command line interface you would use with it (and figures out the command line parameters to give to it, too!). It supports MySQL (including MariaDB), PostgreSQL, and SQLite3.

trans-unit.source: scaffold_stylesheet creates scaffold.css when generating a scaffolded resource. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: scaffold_stylesheet 在生成支架资源时会创建 scaffold.css 。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: scale Defines the scale for the decimal fields, representing the number of digits after the decimal point.
trans-unit.target: scale 定义 decimal 字段的小数位数，表示小数点后的位数。

trans-unit.source: scoped_by_... becomes where(...).
trans-unit.target: scoped_by_... 变成 where(...) 。

trans-unit.source: secret_key_base is used for specifying a key which allows sessions for the application to be verified against a known secure key to prevent tampering. Applications get a random generated key in test and development environments, other environments should set one in config/credentials.yml.enc.
trans-unit.target: secret_key_base 用于指定密钥，该密钥允许根据已知的安全密钥验证应用程序的会话，以防止篡改。应用程序在测试和开发环境中会随机生成一个密钥，其他环境应在 config/credentials.yml.enc 中设置一个。

trans-unit.source: select_date does not work well with forms that update or create Active Record objects as Active Record expects each element of the params hash to correspond to one attribute. The model object helpers for dates and times submit parameters with special names; when Active Record sees parameters with such names it knows they must be combined with the other parameters and given to a constructor appropriate to the column type. For example:
trans-unit.target: select_date 不适用于更新或创建Active Record对象的表单，因为Active Record期望 params 哈希的每个元素都对应一个属性。日期和时间的模型对象帮助程序提交具有特殊名称的参数；当Active Record看到具有此类名称的参数时，它知道它们必须与其他参数组合并提供给适合列类型的构造函数。例如：

trans-unit.source: selected can also be a hash, specifying both :selected and/or :disabled values as required.
trans-unit.target: selected 也可以是散列，根据需要指定 :selected 和/或 :disabled 值。

trans-unit.source: selected_key - A value equal to the value attribute for one of the <option> tags, which will have the selected attribute set. Corresponds to the return value of one of the calls to option_key_method. If nil, no selection is made. Can also be a hash if disabled values are to be specified.
trans-unit.target: selected_key -一个等于 <option> 标记之一的 value 属性的值，该属性将设置 selected 属性。对应于对 option_key_method 的调用之一的返回值。如果为 nil ，则不进行选择。如果要指定禁用值，则也可以是哈希。

trans-unit.source: selected_key - A value equal to the value attribute for one of the <option> tags, which will have the selected attribute set. Note: It is possible for this value to match multiple options as you might have the same option in multiple groups. Each will then get selected="selected".
trans-unit.target: selected_key -一个等于 <option> 标记之一的 value 属性的值，该属性将设置 selected 属性。注意：此值可能与多个选项匹配，因为您可能在多个组中具有相同的选项。然后每个人都将被 selected="selected" 。

trans-unit.source: send_file is often a faster and better option if a layout isn't required.
trans-unit.target: send_file 如果不需要布局，则send_file通常是一个更快，更好的选择。

trans-unit.source: sendmail_settings - Allows you to override options for the :sendmail delivery method.
trans-unit.target: sendmail_settings -允许您覆盖 :sendmail 传递方法的选项。

trans-unit.source: server_options method in Rails::Command::ServerCommand is defined as follows:
session - Any object living in session variables
trans-unit.target: session -任何存在于会话变量中的对象

trans-unit.source: session: A hash of parameters to store in the session. This may be nil.
trans-unit.target: session ：要存储在会话中的参数的哈希。这可能 nil 。

trans-unit.source: set_autoload_paths: This initializer runs before bootstrap_hook. Adds all sub-directories of app and paths specified by config.autoload_paths, config.eager_load_paths and config.autoload_once_paths to ActiveSupport::Dependencies.autoload_paths.
trans-unit.target: set_autoload_paths ：此初始化 bootstrap_hook 在bootstrap_hook之前运行。将 app 所有子目录以及 config.autoload_paths ， config.eager_load_paths 和 config.autoload_once_paths 指定的路径添加到 ActiveSupport::Dependencies.autoload_paths 。

trans-unit.source: set_clear_dependencies_hook: This initializer - which runs only if cache_classes is set to false - uses ActionDispatch::Callbacks.after to remove the constants which have been referenced during the request from the object space so that they will be reloaded during the following request.
trans-unit.target: set_clear_dependencies_hook ：此初始化程序-仅在将 cache_classes 设置为 false 时运行 -使用 ActionDispatch::Callbacks.after 从对象空间中删除请求期间已引用的常量，以便在以下请求期间将其重新加载。

trans-unit.source: set_load_path: This initializer runs before bootstrap_hook. Adds paths specified by config.load_paths and all autoload paths to $LOAD_PATH.
trans-unit.target: set_load_path ：此初始化 bootstrap_hook 在bootstrap_hook之前运行。将 config.load_paths 指定的路径和所有自动加载路径添加到 $LOAD_PATH 。

trans-unit.source: set_routes_reloader_hook: Configures Action Dispatch to reload the routes file using ActiveSupport::Callbacks.to_run.
trans-unit.target: set_routes_reloader_hook ：配置操作分派以使用 ActiveSupport::Callbacks.to_run 重新加载路由文件。

trans-unit.source: signature: A hexadecimal HMAC-SHA256 of the timestamp concatenated with the token, generated using the Mailgun API key
trans-unit.target: signature ：使用Mailgun API密钥生成的，与令牌并置的时间戳的十六进制HMAC-SHA256

trans-unit.source: signature: A hexadecimal HMAC-SHA256 of the timestamp concatenated with the token, generated using the Mailgun Signing key
simple (default)

trans-unit.source: spec_name: The specification name (i.e. primary, animals, etc.). Defaults to nil.
trans-unit.target: spec_name: 规范名称（即主要名称，动物等）。默认为 nil 。

trans-unit.target: starts_with? 和 ends_with?

trans-unit.source: string - The string to perform normalization on.
